lead_paragraph: HARRIS--Sabina Helen, ("Binnie"), died peacefully of heart failure on March 19, 2016, in Cambridge, Massachusetts. She was a child psychologist who, during a long career in Cambridge, helped many children and their parents to lead happier and more productive lives. The daughter of Harry Harris and Anne Averick Harris, Sabina grew up in Great Neck, New York, and graduated from Great Neck High School North. She received a bachelor's degree from Brandeis University and a doctorate from the Harvard School of Education. Sabina enjoyed cooking and baking for her many good friends, and going to concerts and museums with them. She also enjoyed travel and playing piano. She is survived by her brother Charles S. Harris; sister-in-law Judith Rich Harris; nieces Nomi L. Harris and Elaine Harris Valk; nieces' husbands Tim Wilkinson and Christopher Valk; three grandnieces and a grandnephew; and several cousins. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARRIS, SABINA HELEN
